iconClasses.description: The icon classes for the empty state. Defaults to an empty string.

iconColor.description: The color for the icon used in the component. Defaults to an empty string.

iconModifier.description: The modifier for the icon used in the component. Defaults to 'list'.

iconSize.description: The size for the icon used in the component. Defaults to 'xl'

showIcon.description: Whether the icon should be shown. Defaults to true.

subtitle.description: The sub-title of the empty state. Defaults to an empty string.

title.description: The title of the empty state. Required. Will throw an error if unset.
